transcripts.text: What do you feel God is saying to you about what's going to happen next?

There's a certain level of chaos that is coming.  In fact, I hope to be back over here maybe in a month or so, and we're going to talk about the wormwood prophecy.  I think there are some things that are coming that, by the way, could play a role in a great awakening and in a revival.  How?  Because the world is going to be under such terror that they'll be turning to God out of fear.  Yes.  Wow.  And I don't want to be a prophet of doom.  You know me.  I don't like to talk about negative things.
No, you don't.

But I do believe what I will be talking about is very important.  In fact, my message at the next conference in Branson, the reason it's going to be my last message is because it's going to be my most important message.  And there is a certain sense of it being ominous, but also a great deal of hope.
You know, I wish we could do a show, just you and me one day.  Because I want to ask you things like, you wrote a book about the Catholic Church.  Right.
Petrus Romanus.  Yes.  But also wrote Exo-Vaticana.  Yes.  Yes.  Yeah.

Well, I don't know.
But.  But there's something happening.  There's something going to happen there, don't you think?
